outputs.output_descr:
The education sector will focus on providing children and adolescents with safe, inclusive and quality
educational opportunities that ensure they are protected from harm and equipped with life-saving and
life sustaining skills and knowledge.
donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT

outputs.output_descr: The sector seeks to improve the dignity and well-being of the targeted population through improved economic self reliance and environmentally sustainable activities.
donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT

outputs.output_descr: Ensuring better access for vulnerable populations to quality health care services, with an emphasis on maternal and child morbidity and mortality, will contribute to saving lives.
donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT

outputs.output_descr: The sector will focus on saving lives and providing protection to conflict and disaster-affected populations through the provision of emergency shelter and non-food items (ES&NFIs) from the NFI common Pipeline and partner stocks. The

outputs.output_descr: The nutrition sector’s focus for 2014 is to increase the coverage and quality of treatment of acutely malnourished children through the maintenance and establishment of Community Management of Acute Malnutrition (CMAM) programmes.
donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT

outputs.output_descr: The protection sector response plan identifies a number of priority areas requiring urgent intervention, to be undertaken in close coordination with the Sudanese Government and relevant protection actors.
